comments.body: You can extract `ConfigFactory.load()` to separate val to avoid loading config twice.
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,13 @@
+package github.web
+
+import com.typesafe.config.ConfigFactory
+
+case class Repository(owner: String, name: String)
+
+object Repository {
+  def loadFromConfigFile(): Repository = {
+    val owner = ConfigFactory.load().getString("github.repository.owner")
